headline: Monitor your own network with free network flow analytics from Cloudflare
keywords: Birthday Week, Free, Network Flow Monitoring, Magic Network Monitoring, Network, Observability, Visibility
description: Cloudflare is excited to announce that we are releasing a free version of Magic Networking Monitoring (previously called Flow Based Monitoring). Magic Network Monitoring receives network flow data from a customer’s router(s) and provides network traffic analytics via Cloudflare’s dashboard.
